as a result of multi-electron reduction by electron capturing on metal particles.This effect was probably influenced by properties of co-catalyst particles, e.g., loading site, amount, particle size and dispersibility.Decrease in CH 3 OH generation with an excess amount of the co-catalyst may be due to the filter effect caused by photoabsorption andor light scattering of co-catalyst particles.Actually, relative reflectance of the samples in the wavelength of more than 400 nm increased with an increase in
